aboutSection.heading: Get Some Skin in the Game
paragraphs: Description of the Post Christendom Church Planting initiative...

1914 translation by H. Rackham But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful. Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain, but because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure. To take a trivial example, which of us ever undertakes laborious physical exercise, except to obtain some advantage from it? But who has any right to find fault with a man who chooses to enjoy a pleasure that has no annoying consequences, or one who avoids a pain that produces no resultant pleasure?

Section 1.10.33 of de Finibus Bonorum et MalorumAt vero eos et accusamus et iusto odio dignissimos ducimus qui blanditiis praesentium voluptatum deleniti atque corrupti quos dolores et quas molestias excepturi sint occaecati cupiditate non provident, similique sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollitia animi, id est laborum et dolorum fuga. Nam libero tempore, cum soluta nobis est eligendi optio cumque nihil impedit quo minus id quod maxime placeat facere possimus, omnis voluptas assumenda est, omnis dolor repellendus. 2024PlanSection.heading: Our 2024 Plan
paragraphs: As we approach 2024, our goal is to significantly impact post-Christendom communities by planting churches dedicated to spreading the Total Christ message. We've been blessed with a strong start, having raised $120,000 of our $360,000 goal, thanks to the generous support of our community and a matching grant that doubles our impact once we reach the halfway mark.

Our mission extends beyond financial contributions; we're building a devoted prayer team to intercede for the ayer team to intercede for the success of these church plants. Currently, 504 committed individuals are lifting up this cause, and we invite you to join this vital part of our journey.

Your support, whether through prayer, financial contributions, or both, is crucial. Every donation brings us closer to our goal, and every prayer strengthens our resolve. Together, we can plant seeds of faith in fertile ground, nurturing communities centered around the Total Christ vision.

howToGetInvolved.description: Every contribution, large or small, helps us reach our financial goal. Remember, we're just $40,000 away from unlocking an additional $180,000 through our matching grant.
Join our prayer team and commit to regular prayer for the success of our church plants and the communities they will serve.
Share our mission with friends and family who might be interested in supporting our cause.
